description: While exploring the outer reaches of Galaxy Lake, you encounter a damaged spaceship. Help Dash repair it!

puzzles.description: Make Dash automatically turn the lights off then automatically turn off all eye lights.
puzzles.introduction: The ship's power grid must be off.  All of the lights are out.

puzzles.description: After the eye ring, make Dash automatically spin slowly with the left wheel set to 20 cm/s and the right wheel set to -20 cm/s.
puzzles.introduction: Oops!  Dash bumped into the ship while trying to dock with it.  Now the ship is slowly spinning.

hints.description: Drag out a Moving Basics state. Set the left wheel to 20 cm/s and the right wheel to -20 cm/s. Link the state with an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After spinning slowly, make Dash turn on two eye lights when button 1 is pressed.
puzzles.introduction: Dash found a control panel with some buttons.  If we push them in the correct order, it might fix the ship.

hints.description: Link the states with a Button 1 Pressed cue.

puzzles.description: After turning on two eye lights, make Dash turn on 4 eye lights when button 2 is pressed.
puzzles.introduction: The ship is coming back online. Let's press Button 2 to make more lights shine!

hints.description: Link the states with a Button 2 Pressed cue.

puzzles.description: After turning on four eye lights, make Dash turn on six eye lights when button 3 is pressed.
puzzles.introduction: Almost there! We need 6 eye lights, and the spaceship will be at full power.

hints.description: Link the states with a Button 3 Pressed cue.

puzzles.description: After turning on six lights, make Dash automatically play a brave sound. Then make Dash automatically move forward with both wheels set to 80 cm/s.
puzzles.introduction: You did it! Now the ship can blast off at top speed and continue its journey.

hints.description: Link the eye ring to the brave sound using an Auto cue. Add a new Moving Basics state and set both wheels to 80 cm/s. Link the sound to the Moving Basics state using an Auto cue.
